member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the shading rate (for variable-rate shading, or VRS). For more info, see Variable-rate shading (VRS).

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_1X1
member.summary: Specifies no change to the shading rate.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_1X2
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce vertical resolution 2x.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_2X1
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce horizontal resolution 2x.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_2X2
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce the resolution of both axes 2x.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_2X4
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce horizontal resolution 2x, and reduce vertical resolution 4x.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_4X2
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce horizontal resolution 4x, and reduce vertical resolution 2x.

member.name: D3D12_SHADING_RATE.D3D12_SHADING_RATE_4X4
member.summary: Specifies that the shading rate should reduce the resolution of both axes 4x.
